mapper.select: select fc_no as fcNo, free_no as freeNo, fc_writer as fcWriter, fc_content as fcContent, reg_date as regDate, (select count(*) from fc_like where fc.fc_no = fc_no) as fcLikeCount, (select profile_path from member where fc.fc_writer = member_id) as profilePath, (select member_nickname from member where fc.fc_writer= member_id) as memberNickname from freeboard_comment fc where free_no=#{freeNo} order by 1
select ff_no as ffNo, free_no as freeNo, ff_filename as ffFilename, ff_filepath as ffFilepath from freeboard_file where free_no=#{freeNo} order by 1

select * from (select free_no as freeNo, free_writer as freeWriter, free_title as freeTitle, free_content as freeContent, reg_date as regDate, free_readcount as freeReadcount, (select member_nickname from member where member_id=free_writer) as memberNickname, (select profile_path from member where member_id=free_writer) as profilePath, (select count(*) from freeboard_comment fc where fc.free_no=f.free_no) as fcCount, (select count(*) from freeboard_like fl where fl.free_no=f.free_no) as freeLikeCount from freeboard f) where freeNo=#{freeNo}
select count(*) from freeboard_like where free_no = #{freeNo} and free_liker=#{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into freeboard_comment values (fc_seq.nextval, #{freeNo}, #{fcWriter}, #{fcContent}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd PM HH:MI'))
mapper.update: update freeboard set free_readcount = free_readcount + 1 where free_no = #{freeNo}
update freeboard_comment set fc_content = #{fcContent} where fc_no = #{fcNo}
mapper.select: select fclike_no as fclikeNo, fc_no as fcNo, fc_liker as fcLiker from fc_like fl where fl.fc_no in (select fc.fc_no from freeboard_comment fc where fc.free_no=#{freeNo}) and fcLiker=#{memberId}
